refsect2.title: daemon [-h] [--use-irc] [--no-output] [--debug] [--autobuild-config AUTOBUILD_CONFIG]
refsect2.para: Command to manage the daemon. The daemon starts automatically when the command is called. It can be optimized by using some of the options below. The daemon checks all configured Git repositories for new updates and triggers a rebuild of a documentation then.

listitem.para: Connects to the IRC server what is configured in the configuration file.
Useful for developer to get more information about the Daemon process.
Specifies a path to the autobuild config file. This overrides the value in configuration files.
